responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "D5CB4D9C4C209CDE4E973BA741020FBC", "Olek Bellsong is one of the greatest inventors in Verran history. This Dunir smithy specialized in unorthodox designs and often infused applied magic theories into his projects. While most of hisinvetions failed to function he was succesful in creating the Fabulous Compactor, the Steam Caravan, the Frozen Chest and the Clockwork Codex. He existed in the Second Age circa 2500. During the early years of the Harbinger Apocalyse, Olek Bellsong went missing to never be seen again. Curiously, so too did his Tower Arcana once located in the Aela Riverlands.")
name: MIDD_0015_PTS_ClockworkCodex_13
